content: turn your next project on its side with this fun set made with berroco dash the sideline hat is knit sideways and shaped with simple short row while the scarf is worked from one long side to the other making clever use of the stripes in the yarn worked in garter stitch in super bulky merino this cozy sideline set is all fluff **sizes** one size **finished measurements** scarf approximately 72 / 183 cm long and x 6 / 15 cm wide hat approximately 17 / 43 cm around x 9 / 23 cm high with brim folded back **yarn** berroco dash 100 g 1 ball #3859 kilimanjaro for hat 2 balls for scarf **needles** 32 / 80 cm circular needle size 13 / 9 mm *or size to obtain gauge* **notions** tapestry needle **gauge** 14 sts and 28 row = 4 in garter st *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
